XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.1_0: adhigataparamārthaḥ śrīghanavyūha eva prati tuṣitajanārthaṃ yo 'bhavac chvetaketuḥ /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.1_1: tata iha jagadarthaṃ cābhavac chākyaketuḥ sa jayatu jitamṛtyur darśitānantamāyaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.4_0: sarvathā vañcanaṃ mṛtyor muktānām eva yujyate /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.7_0: na vinā jīvitāt sāraṃ saṃsāre kiṃ cid īkṣyate /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.8_0: na duṣkaraṃ yataḥ kiṃ cid upāyair yuktiyojitaiḥ /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.9_0: lakṣaṇād dūrato mṛtyuṃ jñātvā yuktā pratikriyā /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.9_1: maste patati vajrāgnau suprajño 'pi karoti kim //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.10_1: kathyate jñāyate yena maraṇaṃ bhāvi tatparaiḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.11_0: mṛtyor lakṣaṇam ājñātuṃ vāñchā cet kasya cid bhavet /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.18_1: kramaśo 'pi na sarveṣām api tv ekādisaṃkhyayā //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.19_0: adṛṣṭvā lakṣaṇaṃ yatra mṛtyur dṛṣṭaḥ kva cid bhavet /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.19_1: niścetur dūṣaṇaṃ tatra na tu lakṣaṇanāstitā //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.20_0: dṛṣṭvāpi lakṣaṇaṃ yatra na mṛtyur dṛśyate kva cit /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.21_0: niścite dūrato mṛtyau prasiddhir mahatī bhavet /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.23_1: niyato 'niyataś ceti vijñeyaḥ sa tu yatnataḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.24_1: kālo niyata ity ukto 'niyatas tu viparyayāt //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.26_0: karkaṭo rāśir āṣāḍhaḥ puṣyas tu makaro mataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.28_1: vyabhre nabhasi madhyāhne cchāyāyāś ca nirīkṣaṇam //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.31_0: āṣāḍhāt kramaśo vṛddhiḥ puṣyād dhrāsaḥ kramāt tathā /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.32_0: kṣayakāle bhaved vṛddhir vṛddhikāle kṣayo yadi /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.32_1: tam eva kālam ārabhya mṛtyur māsād viniścitaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.33_1: kṣayakāle 'py atikṣaye mṛtyur eva na saṃśayaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.34_1: yāni ṣaṭ ṣaḍ dināny atra kālākālanirūpaṇam //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.36_0: pādayos tālukāṃ viddhvā nābhau vedho yadā bhavet /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.37_0: pādayos tālukāṃ viddhvā yadi cakṣuś ca vidhyati /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.38_0: pādayos tālukāṃ viddhvā nāsikāṃ yadi vidhyati /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.38_1: tribhir dinais tadā nūnam ekākī yāti pañcatām //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.39_0: kuṭiprasrāvayoḥ kāle tulyaṃ syād yadi hañchikā /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.39_1: tasyām eva hi velāyāṃ mṛtyur varṣeṇa tasya hi //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.40_1: jihvāgrādarśane mṛtyur vāsaraiḥ syāt tribhir nṛṇām //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.41_0: māsaiś caturbhir mṛtyuḥ syāt karṇāgre tīkṣṇavedhanāt /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.41_1: sadyo mṛtyur bhaven nūnam ūrṇāsthāne pravedhanāt //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.42_1: tadā māsād bhaven mṛtyuḥ puṇyam evārjayet tataḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.43_1: syāc cet tulyaṃ tadā māsaiḥ pañcatvaṃ yāti pañcabhiḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.44_0: hastayoḥ pādayoś caiva kaniṣṭhānāṃ ca saṃdhayaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.44_1: catvāro yasya vidhyanti tulyaṃ māsāt sa mṛtyubhāk //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.45_1: pakṣatrayeṇa mṛtyuḥ syād yadi dharmaṃ na sevate //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.46_0: tulyakālaṃ yadā vidhyet tālukānāṃ trayaṃ muhuḥ /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.46_1: tribhir dinais tadā mṛtyur yadi śakrasamo bhavet //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.47_1: saptāhān mriyate nūnaṃ yadi na syāt pratikriyā //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.48_0: maithune sati ghaṇṭāyā nādaś cet karṇayor bhavet /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.48_1: tribhir māsais tadā mṛtyur yadi brahmasamo bhavet //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.49_0: kṛṣṇaṃ yadi bhavec chukraṃ śuklāyāṃ pratipattithau /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.49_1: ṣaḍbhir māsais tadā mṛtyur lohitaṃ vyādhisūcakam //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.50_1: yadi vedho 'pratīkāro mṛtyuḥ sadyas tadā bhavet //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.51_1: vedhaḥ sadāho yasyāsau ṣaḍmāsān mriyate dhruvam //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.54_0: cakṣurnāsikayor madhye spandanaṃ cen na dṛśyate /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.55_0: netrayos tārake mliṣṭe sahasā bhavato yadi /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.56_0: akasmān nāsikā vakrā karṇau bhraṣṭau svadeśataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.57_0: akasmād dhṛdayaṃ nimnaṃ syāc cet pakṣāt tadā mṛtiḥ /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.58_0: akasmāt kṛṣṇarekhā syāj jihvāyā yadi madhyataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.58_1: dṛḍho vā dantasaṃdaṃśas tadā mṛtyur dvirātrataḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.59_1: tasminn eva dine mṛtyur athavā pañcavāsaraiḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.60_1: ṣaḍbhir māsais tadā mṛtyur yadi mantrādi nācaret //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.61_0: akasmāj jāyate sthūlaḥ kṛśaḥ kruddho bhayākulaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.61_1: yas tasya mṛtyur varṣeṇa yadi dharmaṃ na sevate //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.62_0: indriyāṇi na gṛhṇanti yathāsvaṃ yasya gocarān /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.62_1: muhuḥ skhalati vāṇī ca muhuś ca mativibhramaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.63_1: darpaṇe salile vāpi svacchāyāṃ yo na paśyati //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.65_0: divā chāyāpathaṃ paśyed ulkāyāḥ patanaṃ tathā /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.67_0: paśyet pretapiśācān adṛśyān anyāṃś ca bhīṣaṇān /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.67_1: prakampate bhṛśaṃ caiva mūrchito vā bhaven muhuḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.68_1: paśyed ekaikaśas tasya mṛtyur māsāvadher bhavet //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.69_1: yaḥ paśyet tasya mṛtyuḥ syāt ṣaḍmāsābhyantare dhruvam //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.70_1: śuṣyanty abhīkṣṇaṃ ṣaḍmāsān maraṇaṃ tasya nirdiśet //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.72_0: arundhatīṃ rohiṇīṃ ca dhruvaṃ chāyāpathaṃ tathā /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.74_0: rātrau sūryaṃ divā candraṃ svanetre jvalanaṃ tathā /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.74_1: tārāṃ merupramāṇāṃ ca samudraṃ ca nadīm iva //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.75_0: nābhau hikkāṃ gude hañchāṃ varṇaṃ padmopamaṃ mukhe /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.76_0: hṛdaye krandanaṃ sāśru prakampam atha tāluni /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.77_1: ātmanaiva hi yaḥ paśyet paśyen mṛtyuṃ sa pakṣataḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.78_1: varṣān mṛtyur bhavet tatra bhaiṣajyādi pratikriyā //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.79_0: ardhaṃ śītaṃ tathā coṣṇam ardhaṃ yasya kalevaram /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.82_0: yasya mastakam āruhya trivarṇo yāti vegataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.83_0: śabdo na śrūyate dehād dhastābhyām apamārjitāt /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.85_0: kardame pāṃśudeśe vā purataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'pi vā /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.86_1: varṣatrayātyayān mṛtyur yadi bhrāntyā na kalpitaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.89_0: paśyed indradhanuś citraṃ dīrghāyuḥ puruṣaḥ sadā /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.89_1: ṣaḍmāsāyur na tat paśyed iti karmavicitratā //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.92_0: nāgān anekaśaḥ paśyet saṃyatān iva saṃtatam /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.93_0: prabhāte vātha sāyāhne jyotsnāyāṃ vā ciraṃ puraḥ /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.93_1: vitatya bāhū svacchāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā paśyec chanair nabhaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.96_0: jānūpari sthitau bāhū kṛtvā mūrdhni tathāñjalim /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.97_0: yadā tv ekaṃ dalaṃ tatra vikāsi parilakṣyate /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.97_1: tasyām eva tithau nūnaṃ ṣaḍmāsān maraṇaṃ bhavet //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.98_1: śrotre śirasi netre ca śabdo dhūmo dyutis tathā //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.99_0: karṇau pidhāya sudṛḍhaṃ gambhīro gulgulo dhvaniḥ /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.100_0: viṃśatiṃ divasān yāvat pañcaviṃśatim eva vā /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.101_0: eṣām apy antarāleṣu śodhyāḥ ṣoḍaśa vāsarāḥ /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.102_1: yo na paśyati tasya syān mṛtyur varṣatrayāvadheḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.104_1: etat sāmānyato jñeyaṃ viśeṣas tv ayam ucyate //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.106_0: sūrye 'pi yadi candrasya kramaḥ syāt pūrvavat tadā /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.114_0: amlāditvaṃ ca rasato nīlāditvaṃ ca varṇataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.115_1: mūtraṃ yasya bhaven mṛtyus tasya ṣaḍmāsamadhyataḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.116_0: kṛṣṇe vā yadi vā śukle pakṣe reto 'tikṛṣṇakam /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.116_1: mṛtyuḥ ṣaḍmāsato no cet tenaiva syāt pratikriyā //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.117_1: candre prabhañjane vāti praveśāt syāt pratikriyā //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.119_1: adyaiva mṛtyur asmākam iti paśyed anityatām //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.120_1: svapno 'py asatyaḥ sarveṣāṃ nātaḥ śraddhā na yujyate //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.121_1: sa svapne pratyayaṃ kṛtvā mṛtyuliṅgāni paśyatu //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.124_0: gardabhaṃ yaḥ samārūḍhaḥ prayāyād dakṣiṇāṃ diśam /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.124_1: bhūyaś ca na nivarteta tadvat tasyāpi jīvitam //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.125_0: yaś cāpi vānarārūḍhaḥ prayāyād dakṣiṇāṃ diśam /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.125_1: tatrasthaś ca vibudhyeta mṛtyuḥ syāt tasya pūrvavat //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.126_0: daṇḍaṃ vā caityayūpaṃ vā naro yas tv abhirohati /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.126_1: vālmīkaṃ pāṃśurāśiṃ vā ṣaḍmāsān na sa jīvati //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.127_0: kālī kumārī saṃkruddhā yā tu badhnāti bandhanaiḥ /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.127_1: kālarātrī tu sā jñeyā saptāhān mṛtyukārikā //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.128_0: kṛṣṇavastrā tu yā nārī kālī kāmayate naraṃ /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.129_0: tamo vā praviśet svapne śvabhraṃ vā cārakaṃ tathā /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.129_1: vṛkṣād vā prapatet svapne sa mṛtyor antike sthitaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.130_0: vṛkṣaṃ tṛṇaṃ vā kāṣṭhaṃ vā viphalaṃ yas tu paśyati /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.130_1: suptaḥ śīrṣe śarīre vā ṣaḍmāsān na sa jīvati //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.131_0: yo vānararathārūḍho gacchet pūrvāṃ diśaṃ naraḥ /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.136_0: kharam āruhya vegena vrajantaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ diśam /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.137_0: raktamālyāni gandhāṃś ca raktāmbaram athāpi vā /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.137_1: yaḥ svapne labhate tasya mṛtyuḥ syād aṣṭamāsataḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.139_0: etāni mṛtyoḥ pratipādakāni liṅgāni bāhyāni yathoditāni /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_1.139_1: vijñāya tāni tvaritaṃ vidheyo mantrādibhir vañcana eva yatnaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.1_0: idānīm āntaraṃ mṛtyor lakṣaṇaṃ kathyate sphuṭam /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.1_1: tac ca vāyūdayāj jñeyaṃ vāyur ghrāṇāsyagocaraḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.2_1: yāvad ādhyātmikaṃ samyag lakṣaṇaṃ naiva niścitam //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.3_0: ubhayor niścayān mṛtyur niścitaḥ syāt parisphuṭam /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.5_1: tad ārabhya dinaṃ mṛtyur mitakālātyayād bhavet //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.8_1: dināni trīṇi pavanaḥ tataḥ sūrye dinatrayam //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.9_0: dinatrayaṃ punaś candre tataḥ sūrye dinatrayam /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.10_0: evaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ samārabhya sūrye vahati mārutaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.11_1: ṣaḍbhir māsair bhaven mṛtyur dharmam eva smaret tataḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.13_1: vahed vāyur yadi tadā kalyudvegādi jāyate //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.15_1: vahed yasya daśāhāni saṃkrāntau mriyate hi saḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.16_1: tasya nāśaṃ vijānīyād ahorātrān na saṃśayaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.17_0: itaś cetaś ca bahudhā yasyārdhapraharaṃ vahet /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.17_1: vāyus tasya vijānīyāt pūjanaṃ lābham eva ca //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.18_1: vāyus tasyārthanāśaḥ syād udvego vā bhayādi vā //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.19_1: samatītya vahed yasya tasya rogādi jāyate //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.20_1: tad ahar jīvitaṃ tasya yadi vajrasamo 'py asau //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.21_1: pañcāhaṃ ced vahet sūrye mṛtyur aṣṭādaśābdataḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.22_1: pañcāhaṃ ced vahen mṛtyur bhavet pañcadaśābdataḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.23_1: jyeṣṭhe 'pi ced bhaved evaṃ mṛtyuḥ syān navavarṣataḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.24_1: pañcāhaṃ māruto mṛtyuḥ ṣaḍbhir varṣais tadā bhavet //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.25_0: māghamāsasya saṃkrānteḥ pañcāhaṃ ced vahen marut /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.26_0: sarvatra dvitricaturo vāyuś ced divasān vahet /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.26_1: abdabhāgais tu te śodhyā yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.27_0: evam eva vahec candre vāyuś cen mṛtyuvarjitāḥ /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.30_0: yatra rāśau naro jātas tasmād yaḥ saptamo 'paraḥ /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.31_0: rāśau tatraiva candraś cej janmanakṣatrago bhavet /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.31_1: pauṣṇaḥ kālaḥ sa vijñeyas tatra mṛtyor nirūpaṇam //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.33_0: yatra velākṣaṇe vāyor gatir anyā pravartate /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.33_1: tatra velākṣaṇe pūrṇe mṛtyur nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.34_0: pauṣṇe kāle vahed vāyur dinārdhaṃ yadi sūryagaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.36_0: pañcāhaṃ ca daśāhaṃ ca tathā pañcadaśāhakam /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.36_1: vahec cet tridvyekavarṣair bhaven mṛtyur yathākramam //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.37_0: tathaiva ced vahed vāyur viṃśatiṃ pañcaviṃśatim /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.37_1: ṣaḍbhir māsais tribhiś caiva yathāsaṃkhyaṃ bhaven mṛtiḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.38_1: syād dvyekamāsaiḥ pakṣeṇa digdinaiś ca kramān mṛtiḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.39_0: triṃśat tu caikatriṃśac ca dvātriṃśad divasān yadi /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.40_0: trayastriṃśaddinaṃ yāvat sūrye ced vāti mārutaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.40_1: tasminn eva dine mṛtyur viṣṇor api na saṃśayaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.41_1: noktāḥ ṣoḍaśasaṃkhyā ye teṣāṃ śodhanam ucyate //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.52_1: ādau kṛtvā dinārdhaṃ sakaladinam athā-harniśaṃ yāvad eva tasmād ahnor dvayaṃ ca tridinam atha catur-vāsarān vyāpya yāvat /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.52_2: prāṇo nāḍyāśrito yo vahati dinapater udgame savyahīne tasmin vijñeyam etad bhuvanaravidiśo maṅgalaṃ ṣaṭ catuṣkam /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.53_0: pañcabhyaḥ pañcaviṃśaddivasagatir ihā-rohate pañcavṛddhyā tasmād ekottareṇa triguṇitadaśakaṃ tryuttaraṃ yāvad eva /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.53_1: kāle pauṣṇe samās tās trinayanaśaśinaḥ ṣaṭtriyugmendavo ye māsās te 'hāni śeṣās tithidigiṣuguṇa-dvīndavo jīvitasya /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.54_1: āyuṣaḥ prāṇavāyoś ca dināny aṅkakramāl likhet //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.55_0: ity āntarāṇy api mayā kathitāni mṛtyor liṅgāny ariṣṭam iti cāparanāmakāni /
XXvamvuppu:vmv_2.55_1: vijñāya tāni sapadi tvaritair vidheyo dhyānādibhir maraṇa-vañcana eva yatnaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:vmv_3.3_1: śraddhām ato dṛḍhīkuryād anyathā syāc chramaḥ paraḥ //
